en_text: 3x ATK and reduce damage taken by 50% when matching 5 Heal orbs in a cross formation

jp_skill.name: そう…この瞬間のために―!!
jp_skill.raw_description: 回復の5個十字消しでダメージを半減、攻撃力が3倍。

kr_skill.name: Yeah... It's all been for this moment!
kr_skill.raw_description: 3x ATK &, halves damage with a cross of 5 Heal Orbs

na_skill.name: Yeah... It's all been for this moment!
na_skill.raw_description: 3x ATK &, halves damage with a cross of 5 Heal Orbs
